concepts.description: A four-sided geometric shape with equal sides and right angles
A textile fiber obtained from sheep and used in garment making
Having a vivid and intense color appearance
Decorated with patterns sewn with thread
Marked with long bands of contrasting color
A color combination consisting of blue and golden hues
A collar with a rounded shape that fits around the neck
A fine, strong, soft, and lustrous fiber produced by silkworms
Motifs that represent tribal identity or mythology
